SEARCH
Module fi.tuni.prog3.weatherapp
Package fi.tuni.prog3.weatherapp

Class WeatherAppLocalFile

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.prog3.weatherapp.WeatherAppLocalFile
public class WeatherAppLocalFile extends Object
The WeatherAppLocalFile class represents the local configuration file for the Weather App. It stores user preferences such as name, API key, units, default place, favorite places, search history, etc. This class provides methods to initialize default settings and manage user-specific configurations.
Since:
2023-12-06
Version:
1.0
Author:
Nguyen Quang Duc

  • Constructor Details

    • WeatherAppLocalFile

      public WeatherAppLocalFile(String name, String apiKey, boolean isCurrentWeather, long chosenUnixTime, boolean isUnitSI, Place defaultPlace)
      Constructs a WeatherAppLocalFile object with customized user settings.
      Parameters:
      name - The user's name or identifier.
      apiKey - The API key used for weather data retrieval.
      isCurrentWeather - Flag indicating whether to retrieve current weather data.
      chosenUnixTime - The chosen Unix time for historical weather data (if applicable).
      isUnitSI - Flag indicating whether to use SI units (true) or Imperial units (false).
      defaultPlace - The default location/place for weather data retrieval.

    • WeatherAppLocalFile

      public WeatherAppLocalFile()
      Constructs a WeatherAppLocalFile object with default settings. The default values include an empty name, default API key, and other preset configurations.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      The method retrieves the name associated with the Weather App's local configuration.
      Returns:
      The name stored in the Weather App's local configuration.

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Sets the name for the Weather App's local configuration.
      Parameters:
      name - The new name to be set in the Weather App's configuration.

    • getAppId

      public String getAppId()
      Retrieves the API key stored in the Weather App's local configuration.
      Returns:
      The API key used for accessing weather data.

    • setAppId

      public void setAppId(String apiKey)
      Sets the API key for accessing weather data in the Weather App's local configuration.
      Parameters:
      apiKey - The new API key to be set in the Weather App's configuration.

    • isCurrentWeather

      public boolean isCurrentWeather()
      Checks whether the Weather App is set to retrieve current weather data.
      Returns:
      true if the Weather App is configured to fetch current weather data; otherwise, false.

    • setCurrentWeather

      public void setCurrentWeather(boolean currentWeather)
      Sets the configuration for the Weather App to retrieve current weather data.
      Parameters:
      currentWeather - The flag indicating whether to fetch current weather data (true) or not (false).

    • getChosenDate

      public long getChosenDate()
      Retrieves the chosen date or Unix time stored in the Weather App's local configuration.
      Returns:
      The chosen date or Unix time for historical weather data retrieval.

    • setChosenDate

      public void setChosenDate(long chosenUnixTime)
      Sets the chosen date or Unix time for historical weather data retrieval in the Weather App's configuration.
      Parameters:
      chosenUnixTime - The new chosen date or Unix time to be set in the Weather App's configuration.

    • isUnitSI

      public boolean isUnitSI()
      Checks whether the Weather App is configured to use SI units.
      Returns:
      true if the Weather App is set to use SI units; otherwise, false for Imperial units.

    • setUnitSI

      public void setUnitSI(boolean unitSI)
      Sets the unit system configuration for the Weather App to use SI or Imperial units.
      Parameters:
      unitSI - The flag indicating whether to use SI units (true) or Imperial units (false).

    • getDefaultPlace

      public Place getDefaultPlace()
      Retrieves the default place/location stored in the Weather App's local configuration.
      Returns:
      The default place/location for weather data retrieval.

    • setDefaultPlace

      public void setDefaultPlace(Place defaultPlace)
      Sets the default place/location for weather data retrieval in the Weather App's configuration.
      Parameters:
      defaultPlace - The new default place/location to be set in the Weather App's configuration.

    • getSearchHistories

      public List<Place> getSearchHistories()
      Retrieves the list of search histories stored in the Weather App's local configuration.
      Returns:
      The list of search histories maintained by the Weather App.

    • setSearchHistories

      public void setSearchHistories(List<Place> searchHistories)
      Sets the list of search histories for the Weather App's local configuration.
      Parameters:
      searchHistories - The new list of search histories to be set in the Weather App's configuration.

    • addSearchHistory

      public void addSearchHistory(Place newSearch)
      Adds a new search history to the list of search histories. Limits the number of search histories to the specified maximum number.
      Parameters:
      newSearch - The new Place object representing the search to be added.

    • getFavouritePlaces

      public List<Place> getFavouritePlaces()
      Retrieves the list of favorite places stored in the Weather App's local configuration.
      Returns:
      The list of favorite places maintained by the Weather App.

    • setFavouritePlaces

      public void setFavouritePlaces(List<Place> favouritePlaces)
      Sets the list of favorite places for the Weather App's local configuration. This method allows updating the list of favorite places with a new set of places.
      Parameters:
      favouritePlaces - The new list of favorite places to be set in the Weather App's configuration.

    • addFavouritePlace

      public void addFavouritePlace(Place newPlace)
      Adds a new favorite place to the list of favorite places. Limits the number of favorite places to the specified maximum number.
      Parameters:
      newPlace - The new Place object representing the favorite place to be added.

    • removeFavouritePlace

      public void removeFavouritePlace(Place removedPlace)
      Removes a favorite place from the list of favorite places if it exists.
      Parameters:
      removedPlace - The Place object to be removed from the list of favorite places.

    • isFavouritePlace

      public boolean isFavouritePlace(Place currentPlace)
      Checks if a place is present in the list of favorite places.
      Parameters:
      currentPlace - The Place object to check if it exists in the list of favorite places.
      Returns:
      true if the place is found in the list, otherwise false.
